Máté Marjai

I am a delivery and product focused software engineer working with industry leading companies as well as startups. Team player on all levels, I love creating great products that many people use day to day.

Lead Software Engineer, Acceptance and Payments team at SumUp

January 2014 - June 2014

Key Achievements

Leading the project to deliver Pin+ - state of the art Chip and PIN solution for SMBs. Turning the product from early prototype phase into production ready state. Creating a delivery focused culture and advocate continuous delivery.

  • Developing the new generation payments API and gateway as part of the payments team
  • Team and scrum lead for the payments team on Pin+
    • Guide and lead the delivery of our core product - Pin+; mPOS Chip and PIN device
    • Working with hardware engineering closely in the integration phase of Pin+ to bring it into production
    • Support the device and system certification process: GICC - EMV payments, MTIP - MasterCard, ADTV - Visa, Visa Live tests

Tech leadership team member designing v2 for SumUp's systems.

Key member of the Dublin Leadership group defining our culture. Talk on various meetups about our achievements in SumUp. Engaging with the Berlin and Dublin tech groups, part of local awareness campaign about our product.


Senior Software Engineer, Experience and Payments team at SumUp

January 2012 - January 2014

Key Achievements

Built up the Dublin Software Team from the inception of SumUp. Working closely with SumUp's founders from the get-go. Design and create the core API and all the pieces around it with the team in Dublin. Working closely with SysOps on bootstrapping deployment processes.

  • Deliver and maintaining internal admin interface for Customer Service, Payment Operations, AML
  • Design and lead core API development to handle payment transactions, merchant authentication and signups
  • Create the deployment procedure and introduce continuous integration and delivery to aid the team to deploy more frequently with ease
  • Lead the team to roll out 6 additional countries on top the initial 4 within 3 months after launch

Created DSL to describe onboarding flows that can be controlled from the backend on all signup channels (web, apps). Creating early prototypes for our award winning 'customer app' proof of concept. Creating the SumUp app-switch API. Receipt delivery and printing R&D.

  • Dynamic Signup DSL for centralizing signup flow to have a unified experience on all platforms(iOS, Android, web), with A/B testing & analytics
  • Tech lead and mentor to junior developers, helping them to grow as a programmer and team player
  • Creating for award winning prototype for a customer payment app (Finnovate, January 2013)
  • Design and deliver solution for receipt printer and coherent receipt generation and display

Web Developer, Cashier team, Payments at Full Tilt Poker

November 2008 – January 2011

Key Achievements

Joined the team as a Junior member, within the first few months established myself as one of the key members of Full Tilt's payments team. Delivered and supported over 50 projects of various complexity, all of which were mission critical for the business. Most notable ones include: Single click deposit, Cancel withrawal, Targeted marketing messages, Flexible player limits. Designed and delivered analytics and monitoring tools. Slimmed down our deployment process from a 25-step list into a single click solution.

  • Helped the team discover and solve vulnerabilities within cashier system
  • Designed and created diagnostic tools for production systems
  • Took initiative in TDD and improving unit testing with PHPUnit
  • Code optimizations and refactoring on application code base and internal framework
  • Deployment management and improving deployment process with automated deployments
